The Qurâ€™anic researcher said that he will not remain and do not seek a chain of man Coordinator and the worker in the sense of the glorification, that is, the greatest of the future, and the most important thing is that it is not the rest of it.Halik caught it until it is returned.Ibn Abbas said that it does not remain if you take them in them, and nothing remains from them.With an increase in and for everything, a virginity and a miracle (except) hell.It was said that you do not keep anything and do not call it from destruction, but everything that is given to you is not a referral.Al -Saddi said: Do not remain for them and do not be a bone, and it is without what was presented.
